name: waltz
description: Graceful modal editing for VS Code. A Vim-inspired editor with VS Code-native selection handling.

commands.title: Waltz: Enter Insert Mode After Cursor (a)
Waltz: Enter Insert Mode at Line Start (I)
Waltz: Enter Insert Mode at Line End (A)
Waltz: Enter Insert Mode New Line Below (o)
Waltz: Enter Insert Mode New Line Above (O)
Waltz: Change to End of Line (C)

keybindings.comment: === Normal モードワード移動 ===
=== Visual モードワード移動 ===
=== Visual モード オペレータ ===

waltz.customBindings.description: Custom key bindings that execute VSCode commands.

keys.description: Key sequence to trigger the commands (e.g., ["g", "d"]).

modes.description: Vim modes where this binding is active. If not specified, applies to all modes.

commands.description: Array of VSCode commands to execute sequentially.

args.description: Optional arguments to pass to the command.

waltz.modeDisplay.normal.label.description: Display text for normal mode in the status bar.

waltz.modeDisplay.insert.label.description: Display text for insert mode in the status bar.

waltz.modeDisplay.visual.label.description: Display text for visual mode in the status bar.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
